Tom Emerson wrote:

>...
>
>The CruiseControl builds stop at at 8/12, which is just before the
>hardware failure at SF: presumably it uses pserver access to get the
>latest CVS HEAD snap?
>

>
Our build goes against a different cvs server up at sourceforge.  It 
turns out our continuous build was failing without flagging us because 
we broke something.  Should be back sometime tomorrow.
St.Ack
